synapse

Class SynapseCollectionGraupner2012

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amd.aparapi.Kernel
      • base.ComponentCollection
        • base.ConfigurableComponentCollection<C>
          • synapse.SynapseCollection<SynapseConfigurationGraupner2012>
            • synapse.SynapseCollectionGraupner2012
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentConfigurationListener, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SynapseCollectionGraupner2012
extends SynapseCollection<SynapseConfigurationGraupner2012>
    Implementation of the synapse model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location. PNAS. 109, 3991â€“3996 (2012). (using the simplified calcium model).
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Initialise the collection. This method should be called from a sub-classes constructor. Sub-classes should override this method to set the values for pre-calculated values used during the simulation, and call this super-method. Arrays/buffers initialised here and used in the run() method/kernel should be transferred to the execution hardware using put().
        Overrides:
        init in class SynapseCollection<SynapseConfigurationGraupner2012>

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: SynapseCollection
        Resets all synapses to their initial state. Sub-classes should override this method if state variables other than the efficacy must be reset, or if the efficacy should be set to something other than 0. The overriding method should invoke this super-method (before doing anything else). Arrays/buffers reset here and used in the run() method/kernel should be transferred to the execution hardware using put().
        Overrides:
        reset in class SynapseCollection<SynapseConfigurationGraupner2012>

      • step

        public void step()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Update the model over one time step. Sub-classes should call this super method. The step() method will invoke the overridden run() method which defines the Aparapi kernel.
        Overrides:
        step in class ComponentCollection

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in class com.amd.aparapi.Kernel

      • getStateVariableNames

        public java.lang.String[] getStateVariableNames()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Get an array containing the names of all the internal state variables. Sub-classes may override this to allow the component to be used for testing or educational purposes.
        Overrides:
        getStateVariableNames in class ComponentCollection

      • getStateVariableValues

        public double[] getStateVariableValues(int synapseIndex)
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Get an array containing the values of all the internal state variables, in the same order as that given by getStateVariableNames(). Sub-classes may override this to allow the component to be used for testing or educational purposes.
        Overrides:
        getStateVariableValues in class ComponentCollection
